body:
This problem still occurs.
I have route: `'GET media/<id:[\w\.-{}]+>/thumbnail' => 'file/file/get-thumbnail',`
and controller action:
```
public function actionGetThumbnail($id, int $w = null, int $h = null, int $q = null, bool $a = false, bool $u = false): Response { /* ... */ }
```
and it works, but after add type for first argument:
```
public function actionGetThumbnail(int|string $id, int $w = null, int $h = null, int $q = null, bool $a = false, bool $u = false): Response { /* ... */ }
```
got
```
Error
Call to undefined method ReflectionUnionType::isBuiltin()
in /var/www/alterpress/vendor/yiisoft/yii2/web/Controller.php:148
```

Yii2 2.0.48 May 22, 2023

@bizley

body: @tomaszkane please check if my solution fixes the problem.

Yes, after adding this IF no error occurs.
